alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Crockett; Dyer; Gibson; Henry; Lake; Obion; Weakley (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 18 at 3:02PM CST until January 20 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 11 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Portions of West Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 10 PM Friday to 11 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. Low wind chills values could lead to frostbite and hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Carroll; Crockett; Dyer; Gibson; Henry; Lake; Obion; Weakley
